attributes.action: Fight for womens abortion rights in the US.
attributes.additional_details: So many girls are raped and have children without proper financial support or education on how to adhere to a child. I find it disgusting that males who don’t even have to go through the pain of carrying a child get to decide wether women keep theirs or not, I believe it’s a woman’s uterus so it’s their choice. We need to remember pregnancy isn’t always a choice and it isn’t always an option. I hope we can make change and help  girls because this isn’t deserved and quite frankly it isn’t right.
attributes.background: We need to lift the van of abortions in the US.  It’s unacceptable and dehumanises women and takes away their rights. I understand this isn’t a issue in the UK but we can still fight for what’s right and make a change. It’s an unjust, disgusting action and it needs to be changed fast.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about domestic legislation in other countries are a matter for the relevant legislatures and judiciary, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Condemn the US for overturning legal rights to abortion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619039
